scope.title: Columns
scope.description: A grid consists of a framework of cells laid out and aligned vertically and horizontally. It helps users read and visually navigate website content more easily, using a responsive, scrollable column structure.

data.title: Columns
data.description: A grid consists of a framework of cells laid out and aligned vertically and horizontally. It helps users read and visually navigate website content more easily, using a responsive, scrollable column structure.
